Description:
2034.
Deep beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow, in the dilapidated subway tunnels, the remnants of humanity struggle to survive. Hordes of mutants storm last refuge of survivors.

But rather than unite, the Metro is divided into warring factions that fought each other for control of the underground. Under the ground started this civil war that could wipe humanity from the face of the earth.

You - Artem, and you have the key to the survival of mankind - the last ray of light in this dark time ...
